name: Better:9anime
description:
(PS: lost my older account so I made a new one and posted the updated version to get 9anime.ch to work on it.)
Updated 9anime style to hide many ads as possible to stop the site from ruining your experience while watching your favorite shows. Feel free to edit or report any unstopped ads if you're able to report its ID or CLASS.
additional_info:
January 23th 2018:
Updated the style to also work on 9anime.ch (sorry for the long wait, I was really lazy to create a new account after loosing my old one.)
